## isConditionalContextProvider() function

Checks if an input array is either a filter provider or a rule set provider

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isConditionalContextProvider(input: unknown): input is ConditionalContextProvider;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | unknown | An array of filter providers or rule set providers |

<b>Returns:</b>

input is ConditionalContextProvider

Whether the array is a valid [ConditionalContextProvider](./node-tracker.conditionalcontextprovider.md)
